did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Methodist Episcopal Church of New Hope and Kelloggsville records, 1853-1908.

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: Methodist Episcopal Church of New Hope and Kelloggsville (N.Y.)

did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Contains registers of pastors, members, classes, and baptisms.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Contains registers of pastors (1853-1907); members (1883-1902); classes (1886-?); and baptisms (1908).
